local_intent: Grasp the fridge handle by closing the gripper after detection and alignment, then verify the grasp is stable.
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase with CloseGripper(force=20, timeout_ms=800) following DetectObject and ApproachAndAlign, then verifies using IsGraspStable; consistent with the global plan to grasp the handle before opening the hinged door.
